attributes.action: stop the forced relocation of English Heritage staff out of London and the SE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Treasury policy has created the forced relocation of specialist staff from the conservation department of English Heritage to either Swindon or Birmingham from their present homes in and around the SE of England. What about the impact on partners and spouses lives and jobs, the disruption to children's education?
